title: @RiotLyte / RiotOthers ; ROUND TWO (Perma chat restriction)
body:
http://i62.tinypic.com/mhq5ab.jpg

I told you this would happen. I TOLD YOU (Link to the thread where I told you this would happen: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/PPLg1lvX-riotlyte-riotothers-perma-chat-restrict )
I TOOOOOLLLLLDDDD YOUUUUUUU.

Anyway, I will continue to update this thread once per day and per match that I complete until Riot tells me why I am perma-chat restricted.
